name: nitsan/ns-snow
description: Christmas Snow spreads the cheer of Christmas by adding beautiful snowflakes and snow-fall animation to your TYPO3 website with our little addon ns_snow and all the pages will show falling flakes of snow! Live-Demo: https://demo.t3planet.com/t3t-extensions/snow/ You can download PRO version for more-features & free-support at https://t3planet.com/typo3-snowfall-extension
